location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Councils at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: A thin strip of the right-hand side of the item's text is missing but the text remains legible on the whole.

mods.abstract: The letter is a short note in which Beaumont and Green state that they have sent their books for the previous year (up to April 1778) and their monthly accounts for April to Bushire. Shipped by Abdul Rezah.The date span of the entire file (1778 to 1787) is marked on the top right-hand side of the item in large handwritten-text.
